endpoints.description: Returns information about the Shodan account linked to this API key.
endpoints.name: account profile

endpoints.description: Get a list of files that are available for download from the provided dataset.
endpoints.name: bulk data

endpoints.description: Get all the subdomains and other DNS entries for the given domain. Uses 1 query credit per lookup.
endpoints.name: dns domain

endpoints.description: Look up the IP address for the provided list of hostnames.
endpoints.name: dns resolve

endpoints.description: Look up the hostnames that have been defined for the given list of IP addresses.
endpoints.name: dns reverse

endpoints.description: This method behaves identical to "/shodan/host/search" with the only difference that this method does not return any host results, it only returns the total number of results that matched the query and any facet information that was requested
endpoints.name: host count

endpoints.description: Returns all services that have been found on the given host IP.
endpoints.name: host ip

endpoints.description: Search Shodan using the same query syntax as the website and use facets to get summary information for different properties.
endpoints.name: host search

endpoints.description: This method returns a list of facets that can be used to get a breakdown of the top values for a property.
endpoints.name: host search facets

endpoints.description: This method returns a list of search filters that can be used in the search query.
endpoints.name: host search filters

endpoints.description: This method lets you determine which filters are being used by the query string and what parameters were provided to the filters.
endpoints.name: host search tokens

info.description: Search Engine for the Internet of Everything
info.name: Shodan
